page.title: 13The Merton Hotel
page.content: During the war the hotel was used as a hospital for the German airforce, now it is the{largest hotel}in our area. Between June and September the Merton takes in about{700 guests.}There is a large extension being added to the hotel this year. They have put in tennis courts, a table tennis room, squash courts and a Jacuzzi by the pool. We have seen the workmen working, building and painting the inside and outside of the Merton. A lot of children who live nearby use the pool at the Merton. They have four diving boards, a ground-level one, a three metre, a five metre and a ten metre.
